A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't know that gravity was a thing in space. How did the bombs drop from the bomber unto the destroyer in space? Leia can survive in the vacuum of space and propel herself with what? Her farts? She was holding out her finger for the force to pull it after all. The lasers firing on the rebel ship during the chase were at an angle...again would that not insinuate gravity. All the rebel commanders were women(cool\, calm\,and collective) and the first order commanders were men(angry\, bitter\, and conniving). The dialogue was immature. The condescending woman admiral who heroically sacrificed her life and the little fat Chinese chick who saved Finn from heroically sacrificing himself. Yeah......
